OrientationFeedForward Class Reference
FeedForward

A Orientation feed forward class. It uses a given orientation and calculates a robot arm pose that compansates the motion by the change of orientation (null space motion). More...

#include <orientation_feed_forward.h>

Detailed Description

A Orientation feed forward class. It uses a given orientation and calculates a robot arm pose that compansates the motion by the change of orientation (null space motion).
